subject: Debian 4.0 Speakup iso is up
body:
Hey all,

The Debian 4.0 netinst speakup iso is now up and ready for
testing.  The URL is:
http://people.debian.org/~shane/speakup/netinst/

The iso is a modification of the Debian multi-arch disc
with powerpc dropped due to lack of hardware on my part but
is installable on amd64 and i386 architectures depending on
the kernel used.  Further instructions found in readme.txt
on the website or README.speakup on the CD itself.

Any problems, let me know.

Shane
-- 
http://www.cm.nu/~shane/

_______________________________________________
Speakup mailing list
Speakup@braille.uwo.ca
http://speech.braille.uwo.ca/mailman/listinfo/speakup
